content.detailedDescription:
I am not sure of the year or time of this sighting but it occurred in the mid to late 70���s. i was talking to a friend outside of my parent���s house one summer night. we noticed a strange object fly and hover close to or over grumman aerospace site in bethpage ny. it was a disk shaped object with a rim of flashing lights around it border. 

both friend and i witnessed this object. as i said it hovered for some time over us. all at once a bright light came from the center of the craft and beemed down a pond us. i can remember that i felt that i was in a frozen state and unable to move. it felt as if my spine was frozen. i could look around but was unable to move. then a strange thing happened it seemed that my friend was being lifted up towards the object. i myself felt that i was only a foot tall as i looked up at my friend. at this time strange enough my friend was looking down at me. all of a sudden we were back to normal and ran as fast as we could to his mom���s house. even though we are not sure of the time of night that this took place we are sure that several hours had passed before being able to move freely again. that is all i can remember. my friend���s mom was very upset and felt that we must have been drinking or doing something else. we were not drunk or on drugs at all. we actually were the exception of the time and were drug free.
content.summary: Ufo spotted over grumman aerospace in bethpage ny - mid 70s.

content.detailedDescription: Got up for glass of water in early am- looked out kitchen window and saw a horizontal group of lights close together and moving at same time in sw direction....Estimated to be toward huntington beach or cypress. low in sky. lights indicated a somewhat circular shape and were not quite flashing but would get brighter and then appear to become more pronounced. the way they gave off light was not like lights from a plane in the sense that they did not flash but merely got brighter at times. lights, perhaps 6-8, were white mostly and there was red light on one side and perhaps a green light on other side. was not a plane- this was lateral in the sense of the position of lights- moved collectively and slowly, deliberately toward hb area. this was viewed in north orange county. i watched for 2-4 minutes as craft disappeared. time was 3-3:04am. this was not a plane or helicopter- grouping of lights indicated a laterally wide or perhaps oval shape. no sound.
content.summary: Grouping of  lights moving together

content.detailedDescription:
We first noticed this object last saturday night. we observed it (and took pictures) for at least an hour. it would sort of drift to the right, then move more rapidly to the left - but all in one smooth motion. we saw it come closer to us and then pull away - then come closer again. 

we have observed it two or three times this week. it will be there hovering...Then disappear for a couple of hours...Then re-appear in the same general (though not exact) location.

tonight, the object seemed somwewhat closer than usual. we watched it for a while and eventually it moved sort of up and off into the distance, zigzagging a great deal.

then, about 45 minutes ago (approx. 1:40 - 1:50 am), i notied it was back. this time it was much larger (therefore probably much closer) than in previous sightings. it looked like an oval (dark in the center) with lights like fireworks shooting all around the craft. the lights would be distinctly green, then distinctly red, then distinctly white, blending into a  mixture of all three colors. 

i'm not a good judge of distance, it we could clearly see the shape of the craft surrounded by these "fireworks" lights. as i look out the window just now, the object seems to have pulled away quite a bit. it's about half the size as it appeared about a half hour ago.

of course (i just saw your questions to the side here), at first we thought it was a planet - not a star. it has never twinkled. then we thought it was perhaps a satellite. but as we watched the odd maneuverability of this thing, we realized it seemed to be moving with a purpose - as opposed to a satellite making its way across the sky "on course".

this is an intriguing situation and i was wondering if anyone else in the area has seen this object as well. 

the pictures we took were on my husband's phone the first night we spotted it. we didn't take any pictures tonight.  will be happy to furnish the pics as soon as we download them.
content.summary: Has shown up often in last week. tonight it disappeared around 10:00 pm. then reappeared around 1:50 am.  object moves erratically.

content.detailedDescription: At about 2:45am est i had gone outside to smoke a cigarette and i always look at the sky enjoying the stars. looking west, there was a stationary bright object of flashing lights. i thought at first it was a plane as the lights were red, green and yellow and the airport is nearby, but it never moved or grew larger or smaller. there was no sound and when i've seen planes in that proximity in the past i can hear them. i went back inside as it was cold and thought i'd report it. i have seen this type of object at least once before at about the same time.
content.summary: Stationary flashing lights.

content.detailedDescription: Eastern sky flying north to south
content.summary: Eastern sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Unlike what the previous person posting about the "star" object disappearing before it crossed the moon, what i saw was the moon was behind the house while i was in the front of the house & i looked up & saw this star like thing going right across the sky, away from the moon & i was thinking to myself it's too fast to be an airplane & it's not blinking & it's way too white bright to be any kind of airplane light, it went by kinda fast & then just went dimmer & dimmer way too fast. it went towards trenton.
i'm outside quite frequently, being a smoker who smokes outside, i have become very familiar with the night sky. i have seen alot of unexplainable occurrences. this just adds to my list of many.
content.summary: Saw what looked like a star going horizantal then just disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
Was in back yard with binoculars, this time looking to the north. i could barely notice two lights with my naked eye traveling together at the same speed. through the binoculars, i could see them very clearly. once again, these were pretty far away, but not as far away as the last sighting. they may have even been somewhere between denver and fort collins
probably 45 to 50 degrees up from horizon. they were north-west of me, and i followed them with the binocs as they moved into my southern view. at first, they traveled in perfect unison to eachother, the following one a little higher than the leading one. the following one then seemed to jump further forward, and stop, while the other one kept going. it then zipped forward ahead and became the leading one. they continued, then slowed, and stopped. i then realized that this little region they stopped in was pretty active. in addition to the two points (which were now slowly fading away) there were some more little points of light i could barely see even through the binoculars swarming around. the original leading one i realized was still moving just slowly still to my right, and faded from sight. at this point, i was moving more to my left to get a better view, in case they went behind a close-by tree in my yard, and tripped the motion sensor on the halogen light in the yard. this made it difficult to locate the area of activity again, and i never did see any more of them for the night.
content.summary: Pair of ufos traveling together.

content.detailedDescription: Was on roof looking to the south with binoculars at jupiter and its moons when something flew through my view. i could tell it was very far away, as it was barely visible with the naked eye. i tracked it heading east at an apparently very high speed, but not too fast for me to keep up. it got dimmer as it traveled to my left, until it disappeared from even my view in the binoculars. it's possible this was a satellite, as it only traveled in a straight line, and did not move around or make any unexpected maneuvers. the only thing i saw strange about it was how, to my perspective, it seemed to be getting farther away from me, as if it was moving further out into space. normally when i see a satellite, i can watch it over a larger portion of the sky before it disappears. it was just a dim point of light, no pulsing or flashing or anything. about 45 degrees up from horizon.
content.summary: Nothing special, spotted with binocs.

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten off the phone with my sister in law went outside to smoke a grit. started starring at the stars and i had noticed this one star in particular that i had also seen the night before. if was flashing/twinkling like a star but more than normal so i looked around at other stars to see if they were doing it they werent!! so i continued to stare at this "object" and noticed that it was moving side to side and up and down. the movement was more stop and go than continuous. it was flashing a tint of red also i was freaked out my stomach dropped. but i continued to stare at it for about 45 min. at first the light was big and by the end of me watching it looked like it was "taking off" into space and the light became smaller it was still there when i went inside about 10 min ago.
content.summary: Flashing and movement.

content.detailedDescription: Was in the back yard.  looking out to the southeast, i see a bright light far off in the distance, pretty high, almost 45 degrees up.  it appears to be moving upward, and toward the south, maybe south-east. at first it looked kind-of like a plane, but there were no flashing lights, and it looked just a little bit orange-ish. something about the light just looked different from the lights of a plane.  as it rose up higher, moving away from me, a few seconds after i started watching it it just became dimmer and dimmer as it moved away, until i couldn't see it anymore.  not sure if it's because the light it emitted got dimmer, or the object was just moving away really fast.  the whole sighting lasted about 30 seconds or so.  after seeing this, i of course began watching the sky even more closely, and i spotted another light that looked exactly like it to the north of me.  the same thing happened as i started watching it, and it got dimmer as it rose up in the air.  it was the same color, no flashing lights, and may have very well been moving in the same direction as the other one, from my perspective.  this one was lower to the horizon, maybe only 25 degrees up from the horizon.  at this point i'm pretty sure that what i saw was something moving out from somewhere, and dimming itself as it rose up. it didn't look like it was moving away at super-speed, unless it was really far away.  it was definitely moving faster than other aircraft in the area that i see flying around.  i continued to watch the sky for awhile after that to see if they would pop back up somewhere along the trajectory they seemed to be traveling, or if i could spot any more of them, but i did not.  i could tell by the intensity of the light being emitted, and the lack of atmospheric distortion that these things were not extremely high up like a satellite, and more at the level that other aircraft fly at, or at least the second one was.  i think the first one i saw may have been pretty high up, though.  the first one i spotted i almost mis-took for a really bright star or a planet at first glance (as the planets were very bright this evening), of course until i did a double-take and realized it was traveling.
content.summary: Bright white/orangish objects rising up and away.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friend's house in pueblo.  just before 2100, i was on my way out to the garage in back of the house to retrieve some items from my car.  i left through the back door and began crossing the backyard.  looking up in the sky, i saw movement of lights.  there were 3 small spherical, orange lights moving briskly from east to west across the sky.  they were in constant reformation, initially all flying in a straight line, then moving farther apart, back together again, then moving into a triangular formation, and, again, back into a side-by-side line.  i continued to observe the objects until they were out of sight to the west.
content.summary: 3 orange spheres, in changing formation, flying from east to west.

content.detailedDescription:
The first night i witnessed the object was on the night of january 11 2009, i was at work at the sharyland water plant number 1 on the corner of shary road and 5 mile road. around approximately 9:00 pm i observed a light which i first thought to be a star, it had the shimmering effect you see in stars which are low on the horizon, until it began to move. i have been an amateur astronomer since i was 8 years old. i also have 11 years of active duty experience, i have lived near both military air bases and commercial airports and have observed just about every type of commercial and military aircraft including helicopters. i do not believe this was any type of conventional aircraft. the object was at a position to my south, i am guessing distance at around 5 to 10 miles. the object would maneuver and then hover and brighten dramatically, again i have seen the police and customs helicopters at work in the areas,and this was not a helicopter.
the object originally moved from east to west, then returned to an easterly
heading and i lost sight of it behind a line of trees to my south east.
i have included the video clips i caught with my camcorder, these dates span
from jan 11,12,13. i was working at the plant on all these nights. and the sighting times varied from 07:00 pm to around the time when my shift ended at midnight. i was fairly calm throughout the sightings,as i have been a paranormal investigator for the past 6 years.
content.summary: Strange light that would hover and brighten dramatically.

content.detailedDescription:
On january 29th about 6 p.M. i was taking pictures of the queen mary. later that evening i downloaded my pictures off my digital camera and then i realized there were 4 oval lights in one of my photos. my camera was on a long exposure and has exagerated the lights a little but yet these lights do not seem to be a reflection of any other lights in the area. my friends have reviewed the photo but no one seems to have an explanation. 





* i am submitting my photo to you. would you please inform me of your thoughts?
* if you need a better quality i can send it too. this is half the quality jpg puts out.
content.summary: 4 oval lights in the sky above the queen mary in the la harbor.

content.detailedDescription: I was done food shopping at whole foods in north wales and about to put my groceries in the trunk of my car. as i was putting my key into the trunk and opening the trunk, i glanced up at the night sky to admire the crescent moon. i also noticed a very bright 'star-like' object moving horizontally towards the moon from the left side of them moon. at first i ignored it and thought it was an air plane and proceeded to put a bag of groceries into my trunk. then it struck me to look up again because something seemed too peculiar about it to be an air plane. so, i looked back up and noticed the object still moving towards the moon horizontally, but it started to become dimmer and dimmer until it seemed to completely vanish before it reached the moon. it went from bright white star-like, to dimmer, to a dark-orange sphere before disappearing. i thought maybe it was passing over the moon and that is why i couldn't see it.(but, it diappeared before it crossed the moon.) so, i continued to observe for a few minutes but the object never re-appeared. it just simply disappeared or whatever light was on was turned off. i thought maybe it was a shooting star - but i don't think it was as it was way too bright and looked mechanical and moved horizontally and it was actually moving quite fast for a plane.
content.summary: Bright star like white light to left of moon moving horizontally, then slowly vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to check on my animals and of course look up, i am an avid meteor shower watcher. i know all the flight patterns of the commercial planes as we live in a country area with little light pollution and a great view of almost the entire sky. i immediately saw an object that was the brightest thing in the sky. it was 3 or 4 times larger than anything else. the object was round and pulsing red white and blue. first saw it at exactly 10:09 pm i watched it as it was stationary for appox 5 minutes when i went inside for less than a minute and brought out a pair of binoculars. i watched the object for a few more minutes when it started getting larger and flashed brighter than it made a 90 degree turn to the left contrary to local air traffic. it was low to the horizon tree top level. it sped up got brighter still flashing and headed out in an east south east direction until it dropped behind the trees and i lost contact. the time was 10:18 pm est when i lost sight. i watched ofr 5 more minutes but it was gone. the speed it was traveling was much faster than normal aircraft, but it looked like it was mush lower in the sky and i am not that good at estimating air speed but it was much faster than any aircraft could travel.

when i first saw it i just knew it was not a normal object, as i am well versed in the sky at my house, being a meteor counter and just enjoy the night sky i can tell the time of night by the position of the constellations, and know the flight patterns of the commercial airlines fairly well. when i see something out of the norm i will watch it and see what i can.

i had no "feelings" of dread or surprise etc i calmly watched and made good mental note of what happened. this was a good end to the superbowl as it happened just as it was over. it was not a rocket, weather balloon nor swamp gas, just an unknown fast moving flashing object that deviated from the norm.
content.summary: Very bright flashing red white blue hovered low in sky in flight path.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were outside and both noticed a bright white light moving silently from north west to south east. it seemed to slow down and change from white to slightly red then vanish. on realizing what we were seeing, my wife and i both got goose bumps and felt our eyes watering. almost right away it was seen again much lower in the sky moving from east to west. at this point it was white again. it moved fairly quickly across the sky and then vanished again. the reason it caught our eye was that it had no flashing lights or sound. living near buckley airforce base and denver international airport we see aircraft all the time. there are always flashing lights on the planes and quite a bit of noise.  

we unfortunately have no photos or video to back what we saw.
content.summary: Solid white light that turned to red moving quickly then changing place and direction.

content.detailedDescription: Walking down the street i noticed what looked like a faint star moving through the constelation of orion.  it looked very high up and i thought it was maybe a jet flying from west to east.  then i thought it looked more like a satalite because at that altitude jets appear to fly slower, they don't cover as much space, this was moving pretty fast, and i was thinking how rare it is to see a satalite through the light polution of the city (san francisco).  i watched the object for aboutg 5 or 6 seconds then all of the sudden it changed directions at 90 degrees, and was going to the north.  after about 2 seconds it disappeared.  this turn was sudden, unlike anything flying that i am familiar with.  the only other explanation is that i had some object moving across the cornea of my eye, but i doubt this as it doesn't behave like "floaters" we can sometimes see in our eye.  i was a bit shaken by the experience.  the object was as faint as a faint star, looked more like white light than blue.  there were no other colors and it was constant, not blinking or oscillating in intensity.
content.summary: Thought it was a satellite until it made a 90 degree instant turn.

content.detailedDescription: While driving home  my nephew and i witnessed a pencil shaped object pass across the road  ahead of us at a descending angle. my first thought was that is not an airplane. the 2 lane road is tree lined so we only saw the object for a second or two as it passed from west to east about 4 or 5 hundred yards ahead of us. it was moving at a descending  angle, so it looked like it might crash into the hills nearby but the trees obscured our view. it looked like it was at a low elevation below 1500 feet and at that angle and speed would not clear the hills to the east. the sky was clear. the object was a bright blue pencil shaped cylinder with red light at the ends.  the length of the object was about  40 feet . we were slowing down to turn up our lane at that time so we went home and dumped off our groceries and let the dog out. we then drove back to the road to investigate further. i was actually looking to see if the there was a crash in the woods to the east but we saw and heard nothing and went home scratching our heads..
content.summary: A bright blue pencil shaped object with bright red light on the ends passed quickly overhead while driving home.

content.detailedDescription: I saw this object over westminster and springdale streets in huntington beach, california.  the white/silver thing had vanished so i put away my video camera and went back to my yard work.  then i saw the blue/green translucent worm.  it was morphing and moving, these colors were like nothing i���ve ever seen.  i went back inside and grabbed the video camera again.  i managed to get some of this one on dv tape, but the colors are not as intense as watching it live.  again the wind was out of the west, and this object is moving against the wind to the west.  i called my wife out so she could see it too.  it would stay stationary for a while then it would go up or down in my sky and go east sometimes then west.  this was a perfectly clear day, and after this one vanished after 20 minutes, i saw a strange black, two engine jet fly over where the two objects had both been.
content.summary: Blue/green translucent worm over huntington beach.

content.detailedDescription: I saw this object over westminster and springdale streets in huntington beach, california.  i was removing a wasp nest from the eve of my house with a stream of water from a garden hose.  after i knocked it down and was spraying the wasps i looked up at the eve and saw this white/silver shimmering object staying stationary in the sky.  as i watched it, i saw it moving slowly left and right.  it did not seem to be affected by the wind.  the wind was out of the west maybe 5 mph. at ground level.  i went inside and grabbed my video camera.  it is really hard to film these things.  i got some of it on tape but i���m disappointed at my video.  at least i managed to capture something.  the white/silver thing moved back to the west, against the wind, hovering then moving again.  i called my wife out to look at it and my kids saw it too.  unimpressed they went back into the house.  i watched and tried to get it on film for over 15 minutes, and then it just vanished.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White/silver object over huntington beach, california.

content.detailedDescription: I had stepped outside to smoke, and looked up where i had seen something the night before. after my eyes adjusted to the darkenss, about 5 minutes, i was able to view the stars through the trees. i quickly located one of the 'moving' stars, and began to watch it. as it started its path up (moving from western sky towards vertical my relative location) i noticed there were two others flanking it slightly behind, in a standard 3 flight formation. the two side lights moved to parallel, they began to move off at 90 degrees (one north, the other south). they quickly faded from view, while the center one seemed to stop, and remain stationary for some time. having seen something similar the night before, i was more relieved then concerned, as it reinforced the sighting i had the previous night. i am able to state that the objects did move, as i have several bare branch trees to use as points of reference, and could see the lights moving in relation to the trees.  i did not report last nights sighting, as i was unsure if i had really witnessed this,or was suffering from fatigue. i currently take wellbutrin, but do nto feel that this has any bearing, as i take 150 mg once per day, to help with a stop smoking program.  i will report any other sightings here, and i am willing to correspond with mufon via email, but due to my job with the state, i am unwilling to participate in any in-person meetings that could effect my job or family.  iwill also attmept to secure other witnesses. due to the low light levels available, i have not been able to secure any photographs.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed several star-like objects at high angle moving in non-aircraft like manners.

content.detailedDescription: First of all i find it hard to believe that this event did not shake me up more than it did. twenty three years later it still has not hit me. i had a daylight sighting at rose valley lake ten miles north of williamsport, pa. it was about mid may 1986. i was with a fried driving up to the lake to kill time before we went out. we stopped at the lake to watch some fisherman and take in the nice day. we were parked facing south with the sun setting to our west. we were noticing the high amount of air traffic and how well the visibility was that late day. i was locked in on a smaller commercial jet flying lower than the others heading west to east.                                                                            now at this time the sun was nearly blocked by the small mountain to the west. the sky was very clear and it had only a few scattered feather like clouds. thats when the show began. we must have both seen the disk appear at the same time. we both said at the same time something like, "look at that" or "what is that".                                                                            i seen a disk simular in size to the jet. at the time i only new of the new mudic cd disk to compare it to. it is still the best decription until today. it was round and about the same width and length of the jet. it was perfect looking. it was gluiding like behind the jet. it had no exhaust, or vibration like the jet. no sound. it was closing in on the jet at a slow pace. it seemed a long time but it probably was less than a half minute and it just vanishes.                                                                          we remark again at the same time at its vanishing. after a short time it pops up again at the front right of the jet. it seemed to travel at the same speed of the jet to its front right. the pilots must have seen it. it does this for a short time and suddenly takes off directly from the earth at an obvious unearthly speed. it was like it did that on prupose to show off.                                                                            i vividly remember this event and me actually waiving to this disk at one point to let them know i see them. i had a feeling they knew we were watching. this sighting left no dout in my mind they do not belong here. to me now it is why are they here. i have keep this quite for the past twenty of the almost twenty three years.                                                                              the only reason i am telling this story now is out of guilt. i always felt bad that one of those pilots might have been brave enough to report it. i could have been the ground witness to support their sighting. i tried to use any resources available at that time but it was very limited.                                                                             it is so strange to have absolute knowlege of something and not be able to share it. i have been around this country and lived next to air force bases. i have been to my brothers work when he was doing welding inspections on f-16's. i know the skies. if you would ask for a ufo show to leave you no dout, this was it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: A perfect sun sitting observation.

content.detailedDescription:
before i describe what i saw in august near squamish ,bc, let me explain what happened earlier 
that year in missoula montana. i have been interested in watching shows on ufos and looking at videos on you tube of possible ufos, but  until august 2008, i have never seen one personally before.  in a few videos i have seen- like the ones from the us space station- i noticed how they were very bright and can appear and disappear. so i have been looking up at stars and watching for winking etc.  
one night  in missoula, mt in june or july 2008, i was having a few beers and relaxing and looking up at the sky, i saw  a bright light moving across the sky like the bright headlight of an airplane/jet. but there where no blinking red lights at the back like they usually have. all of a sudden the light goes out. i told my self, well it was probably a plane and they went behind a cloud or something. but a few minutes later or maybe even a half an hour later a very bright light- in the same part of the sky i had seen the previous light- blinked on then off, then on  then off again and then was gone. it was vert bright. i wondered to myself, hmm, was that possibly something more than an aircraft. but i wasn't convinced enough one way or the other. but it got my attention.
later that summer in august (2008) i was camping at  a public camping site( i forget the name) near squamish , bc. it's one or two exits out of town when going north, you make  a left and then drive down a road and you can park your car or set up a tent. it was about ten or eleven pm. i was having a few beers and sitting in my lawn chair gazing at the stars. i was looking way up at the stars and trying to see if any of them were winking on and off , trying to see if any of the stars were acting in a different manner than usual, i was toying with the idea that i was seeing stationary craft and was counting them off, when i saw it. way up there, it was a glowing white light like the white glow that a full moon gives off. it was weaving back and forth in tight circular motions very fast.  at one moment, i could see it from the side and it was thin and curved like a bent plate or a frisby shape.  i now have no doubt i have seen a ufo. it was not just a bright light in the sky. i saw this thing really doing fast weaving manuvers and i saw it from the side glowing white (like a full moon) but thin and curved. i have seen one video on you tube of a craft that was flying just like this one and it was bright also, but the you tube video was taken in the daylight. this was at night. it didn't last long, probably less than a minute and i went to bed.

i am confident i have either seen an alien spacecraft or an advanced craft operated by the us or canada or ???

i was not afraid, i thought it was cool and graceful, then it was gone.
content.summary: Looking way up in dark sky saw a bright craft zooming very fast in a circular kind of swerving back and forth motion, and at one point i saw it from a  side angle and it was thin and  curved like a frisby shape.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving colorado (moving back to california from colorado) and driving alone with most of my belongings in my '67 chevelle.  i was somewhere in arizona (not much arround for miles) , it was late in the evening, and i was wanting to find a town where i could spend the night.  i noticed a circular white light facing me out the passenger window.  i could not determine the distance, but as i would look in the rearview mirror, it would appear behind me in a matter of seconds. it moved to an area distant from my passenger window and back behind my car at least two to three times.  there were no other cars behind or ahead of me..On this two-lane highway.  my first thought (upon seeing the light (singular) beside me, was that it may have been a train, as it remained steady, not going up or down.  but it seemed like the light was facing me.  once i saw it in my rearview mirror (in seconds)...I ruled out a train.

during the experience...I did think it could be somekind of ufo...I was a bit uncomfortable during this experience. after the sighting...I recall just being very tired and wanting to get to the next town.  the light just stopped after a matter of a few minutes.


later that same night (i'm not sure how far i traveled) , i noticed my engine dying. i was not out of gas, and i was able to arrive at the outskirst of a town (i do not recall the name of the town), but i remember pulling off the road to park near a service station to rest and await sunrise. i thought it was a very fortunate coincidence that my car died where it did.  i was very tired and decided to sleep for a while while sitting in the front seat next to this service station. (my back seat was loaded with belongings).  i'm sure i slept for a while.

i don't remember further details, but i recall replacing one of the electrical components in my chevelle the next day. i don't recall which one. 

please note, i may have posted this account previously, as i typed this account on a ufo-related website within the last two years.
content.summary: Circular white lights moving rapidly beside and behind my car as i was driving.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to my friends house and i saw a huge bright yellowish/whitish kind of like a headlight star shaped circle in the sky.
after ten seconds, in a millesecond, it dissappeared.  i saw another when i got home, and it stayed for about 5 minutes, my mom has seen it for the past 3 days coming and going.
content.summary: Bright huge yellow light.

content.detailedDescription: We took a picture of my friend trevor.  and in the top left corner of the picture the object is seen. we never saw the picture with our own eyes only in the picture.
content.summary: A saucer like object.

content.detailedDescription:
It was as brighter than an star it was two close together, i want to know if anyone else have seen this object also.

i was driving my car on irvine blvd when i saw this object it was far off in the distance toward the radio station on the hill way up toward the 241 mountains.
i do not what they were but it caught my eye's it was at 5:20 am exactly
too early for jet aircraft because john wayne is closed at that time.
please help me if you could i would like some more information
content.summary: It was a light star like not a star it looked like two stagered close together.

content.detailedDescription: Coming off of an off ramp, i stopped at a light and i noticed an object flying between the stoplights. i thought at first it was a helicopter, but observing it i did not notice the usual features of a helicopter. i took a picture with my cell phone and by then the light changed and i had to turn, i tried to follow it but could not. i hope the picture helps.
content.summary: Was at a light and noticed an object passing between the lights.

content.detailedDescription:
i lived at 928 chestnut street it was the first or second week of febuary 1991 and i went out side to the feild between the alley and the railroad tracks to "walk" our new puppy. while waiting, i stood and stared at the crystal clear sky and was amazed at the amount of stars that night. i was facing to the south and was looking up at about 60 degrees when a large black triangle aproached from my right and progressively started blocking out stars, floating silently and slowly from right to left. in my opinion the object had to be about 1000 feet in the sky(there is a mountain range to the southeast ...In the direction of the thing traveling. my home was about onequarter mile from the base of the mountain)so at that hight and in that perspective the object was about 2 or 3 football feilds long and narrower than it was long.. maybe 2to 1 ratio.  the whole episode lasted less than 5 minutes... scared the hell out of me .... and has been on my mind for far to many years.
thank you for your interest, jay
content.summary: Triangle shape blocked out the night sky.
